title: Dascha Polanco And Mo Amer: Orange Is The New Black Flag
description: Actor Dascha Polanco chats juggling work and nursing school while auditioning for Orange Is the New Black. Then, Mo Amer shares how he got into comedy. This episode originally aired November 16, 2018.
